input_text:
Job Title: 508 Compliance Journeyman

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Finance, Sales

Description:
Description

ARETUM, a leading government contracting company specializing in technology-enabled mission support services, is seeking a detail-oriented and knowledgeable 508 Compliance Journeyman to join our team. As a 508 Compliance Journeyman at ARETUM, you will be responsible for ensuring that our digital products and services are accessible to individuals with disabilities, in compliance with Section 508 of the Rehabilitation Act.

ARETUM is known for providing cutting-edge solutions and outstanding service to Federal clients in various sectors, including Next Generation Analytics, Engineering Services, Training Services, IT Systems, Cyber Security, PMO Support, and Financial Consulting. Our mission is to deliver technology-driven solutions that meet the unique needs of our government clients, enabling them to achieve their objectives effectively and efficiently.

Responsibilities

Collaborate with delivery teams to review and ensure deliverables such as UI/UX designs, Applications, various documents published on websites meet or exceed Section 508 compliance standards as per DODs accessibility requirements. Monitor and stay up to date with latest industry trends, advancements in technology, and evolution of federal accessibility rules, regulations, and guidance. Periodically 508 compliance checks, analyze the reports, create JIRA tickets suggesting potential solutions. Validate 508 fixes implemented by development teams. Assist 508 compliance lead in preparing monthly 508 compliance report showing overall error rate for the application and deliverables. 

Requirements

3-10 years of experience in 508 Compliance testing Thorough and up-to-date understanding of Section 508 of the American with Disabilities Act (ADA) WCAG requirements Proficient with using electronic tools such as SortSite for automated checks and tools such as JAWS (Job access with speech), NVDA (Nonvisual desktop access), Narrator screen readers, ANDI etc. for 508 compliance testing. Experience in redesigning and/or developing solutions to ensure IT software compliance if an accessibility problem is detected. BS in computer science, electronics engineering or other engineering or technical discipline is required. Additional relevant experience may be substituted for education. Must have active Secret Clearance

ARETUM is an equal opportunity employer, committed to diversity and inclusion. All qualified candidates will receive equal consideration for employment without regard to disability, race, color, religious creed, national origin, sexual orientation/gender identity, or age.

ARETUM utilizes e-Verify to check employment authorization.

EEO/AA/F/M/Vet/Disabled.

Benefits

ARETUM is an equal opportunity employer, committed to diversity and inclusion. All qualified candidates will receive equal consideration for employment without regard to disability, race, color, religious creed, national origin, sexual orientation/gender identity, or age.

ARETUM utilizes e-Verify to check employment authorization.

EEO/AA/F/M/Vet/Disabled.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
